chargeHist.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (3 or more 1st degree acts)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Martin R. Raatz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (3 or more 1st degree acts), a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.025(1)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: GFE to maintain fulltime work, school, or combination.

No contact with females under the age of 18 unless at school and supervised. 
No contact with victim M.J.R.

Attend counseling or treatment as recommended.
Attend Sex Offender treatment.
Register as Sex Offender for life. 

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

superMiscConds.notes:
NO contact with females under the age of 18.  

No contact with victims, T.M., S.C.R.  

No social media or dating websites.

Sex offender assessment and follow through as recommended.  

Sex offender registry. 

Pay all court ordrered obligations and supervision fees. 

DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

COURT ORDERS:
16CM709:
Ct. 1 (Sex with Child Age 16 or Older-Repeater)>> 2 Years WSPS, 1 Years IC and 1 Years ES, CONCURRENT. CONDITIONS: No Contact with females under the age 18, No Contact with Victims T.M., S.C.R., Sex Offender Assessment and follow through as recommended, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination, Sex Offender Registry, No Social Media or Dating Websites, Pay all Court ordered obligations and supervision fees, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. Court finds 0 days credit. Not eligible for programming.

PLEA: Ct. 1 Repeated Sexual Assault of same child (3 or more 1st degree acts)>> NO CONTEST

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: with hold sentence and have probabtion for 7 years. Attend counseling or treatment as recommended. Attend sex offender treatment. Register as sex offender for life. No contact with females under the age of 18 unless at school and supervised. No contact with victim M.J.R. GFE to maintain full time work and full time school, or combination.. DNA sample and pay surcharge. Pay court costs. No charges on case 15MA1774. No credit given. COURT ORDERS victim impact statement to be sealed

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept. No contact with victim(s): M.J.R. (non waivable) or females under 18 outside of school unless supervised by someone 25 years of age or older. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
John Bliss
